mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id , c.user_id , p.product_id, u.user_name , p.product_name, c.CART_PRODUCT_QTY, p.product_discount, p.product_price, (product_price * CART_PRODUCT_QTY) money FROM USERS u, PRODUCT p, CART c WHERE u.user_id = c.user_id AND p.product_id = c.product_id AND c.user_id =#{user_id} ORDER BY c.cart_id
SELECT NVL(SUM((PRODUCT_PRICE * CART_PRODUCT_QTY) - (PRODUCT_PRICE * CART_PRODUCT_QTY)*product_discount), 0) MONEY FROM CART C, PRODUCT P WHERE C.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID AND C.USER_ID = #{user_id}
